verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> which came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise וְיָרַדְתָּ֖ <S%H3381><s%> and go down בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <S%H3335><s%> to the potter's וְשָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> and there אַשְׁמִֽיעֲךָ֥ <S%H8085><s%> and there I will cause thee to hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> my words

וָאֵרֵ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> Then I went down בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <S%H3335><s%> to the potter's [וְהִנֵּהוּ כ] (וְהִנֵּה־ ה֛וּא <S%H2009><s%> behold ק) עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> he wrought מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> a work עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָבְנָֽיִם׃ <S%H70><s%> on the wheels

וְנִשְׁחַ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> was marred הַכְּלִ֗י <S%H3627><s%> And the vessel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> that he made בַּחֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> of clay בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> in the hand הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <S%H3335><s%> of the potter וְשָׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> it again וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> so he made כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> vessel אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> another כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after יָשַׁ֛ר <S%H3474><s%> good בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> as seemed הַיּוֹצֵ֖ר <S%H3335><s%> to the potter לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to make פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֽוֹר׃ <S%H559><s%> came to me saying

הֲכַיּוֹצֵ֨ר <S%H3335><s%> with you as this potter הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֨ל <S%H3201><s%> cannot לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> I do לָכֶ֛ם בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ? saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כַחֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H2563><s%> Behold as the clay בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <S%H3335><s%> [is] in the potter's כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> so אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> in בְּיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> so [are] ye in mine hand בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

רֶ֣גַע <S%H7281><s%> [At what] instant אֲדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> I shall speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> concerning a nation וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning מַמְלָכָ֑ה <S%H4467><s%> and concerning a kingdom לִנְת֥וֹשׁ <S%H5428><s%> to pluck up וְלִנְת֖וֹץ <S%H5422><s%> and to pull down וּֽלְהַאֲבִֽיד׃ <S%H6><s%> and to destroy

וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> turn הַגּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> If that nation הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵרָ֣עָת֔וֹ <S%H7451><s%> from their evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> against whom I have pronounced עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> against וְנִֽחַמְתִּי֙ <S%H5162><s%> I will repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָשַׁ֖בְתִּי <S%H2803><s%> that I thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לֽוֹ׃ ס

וְרֶ֣גַע <S%H7281><s%> And [at what] instant אֲדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> I shall speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> concerning a nation וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning מַמְלָכָ֑ה <S%H4467><s%> and concerning a kingdom לִבְנֹ֖ת <S%H1129><s%> to build וְלִנְטֹֽעַ׃ <S%H5193><s%> and to plant

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> If it do [הָרָעָה כ] (הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> adversity ק) בְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> in my sight לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> that it obey בְּקוֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> not my voice וְנִֽחַמְתִּי֙ <S%H5162><s%> then I will repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> of the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֖רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> wherewith I said לְהֵיטִ֥יב <S%H3190><s%> I would benefit אוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> ס

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> now אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> Now therefore go to speak נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Oh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> to the men יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> and to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I יוֹצֵ֤ר <S%H3335><s%> Behold I frame עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> against רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> evil וְחֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H2803><s%> against you and devise עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> against מַֽחֲשָׁבָ֑ה <S%H4284><s%> a device שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> against you return נָ֗א <S%H4994><s%> Oh אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ye now every one מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָֽרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> from his evil וְהֵיטִ֥יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> good דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> and make your ways וּמַעַלְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> and your doings

וְאָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said נוֹאָ֑שׁ <S%H2976><s%> There is no hope כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> after מַחְשְׁבוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H4284><s%> our own devices נֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> are going וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and we will every one שְׁרִר֥וּת <S%H8307><s%> the imagination לִבּֽוֹ־ <S%H3820><s%> heart הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> of his evil נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> do ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שַֽׁאֲלוּ־ <S%H7592><s%> Ask נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> ye now among the heathen מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> who hath heard כָּאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another שַֽׁעֲרֻרִת֙ <S%H8186><s%> horrible thing עָשְׂתָ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> a very בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> such things the virgin יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

הֲיַעֲזֹ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> Will [a man] leave מִצּ֛וּר <S%H6697><s%> [which cometh] from the rock שָׂדַ֖י <S%H7704><s%> country שֶׁ֣לֶג <S%H7950><s%> the snow לְבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon אִם־ <S%H518><s%> ever יִנָּתְשׁ֗וּ <S%H5428><s%> be forsaken מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters זָרִ֥ים <S%H2114><s%> that come from another place קָרִ֖ים <S%H7119><s%> is the cold נוֹזְלִֽים׃ <S%H5140><s%> flowing

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁכֵחֻ֥נִי <S%H7911><s%> hath forgotten עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> Because my people לַשָּׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> to vanity יְקַטֵּ֑רוּ <S%H6999><s%> me they have burned incense וַיַּכְשִׁל֤וּם <S%H3782><s%> and they have caused them to stumble בְּדַרְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1870><s%> in their ways שְׁבִילֵ֣י <S%H7635><s%> paths עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> [from] the ancient לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk נְתִיב֔וֹת <S%H5410><s%> in paths דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [in] a way לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cast סְלוּלָֽה׃ <S%H5549><s%> not cast up

לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> To make אַרְצָ֛ם <S%H776><s%> their land לְשַׁמָּ֖ה <S%H8047><s%> desolate [שְׁרוּקַת כ] (שְׁרִיקֹ֣ות <S%H8292><s%> bleating ק) עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> [and] a perpetual כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> Everyone עוֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> every one that passeth עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and יִשֹּׁ֖ם <S%H8074><s%> thereby shall be astonished וְיָנִ֥יד <S%H5110><s%> and wag בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> his head

כְּרֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> wind קָדִ֥ים <S%H6921><s%> them as with an east אֲפִיצֵ֖ם <S%H6327><s%> I will scatter לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אוֹיֵ֑ב <S%H341><s%> the enemy עֹ֧רֶף <S%H6203><s%> them the back וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not פָנִ֛ים <S%H6440><s%> and not the face אֶרְאֵ֖ם <S%H7200><s%> I will shew בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אֵידָֽם׃ <S%H343><s%> of their calamity ס

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said לְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַחְשְׁבָ֣ה <S%H2803><s%> and let us devise עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יִרְמְיָהוּ֮ <S%H3414><s%> against Jeremiah מַחֲשָׁבוֹת֒ <S%H4284><s%> devices כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> Surely לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תֹאבַ֨ד <S%H6><s%> shall not perish תּוֹרָ֜ה <S%H8451><s%> for the law מִכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> from the priest וְעֵצָה֙ <S%H6098><s%> nor counsel מֵֽחָכָ֔ם <S%H2450><s%> from the wise וְדָבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> nor the word מִנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> from the prophet לְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַכֵּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and let us smite בַלָּשׁ֔וֹן <S%H3956><s%> him with the tongue וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> no נַקְשִׁ֖יבָה <S%H7181><s%> and let us not give heed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <S%H1697><s%> to any of his words

הַקְשִׁ֥יבָה <S%H7181><s%> Give heed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> to me O LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> and וּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> and hearken לְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice יְרִיבָֽי׃ <S%H3401><s%> of them that contend

הַיְשֻׁלַּ֤ם <S%H7999><s%> be recompensed תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash טוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> good רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> Shall evil כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָר֥וּ <S%H3738><s%> dig שׁוּחָ֖ה <S%H7745><s%> a pit לְנַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> for my soul זְכֹ֣ר ׀ <S%H2142><s%> Remember עָמְדִ֣י <S%H5975><s%> that I stood לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before לְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> thee to speak עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> their behalf טוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> good לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> for them [and] to turn away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H2534><s%> thy wrath מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like
